error.message: Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_Test_Method: since 1.12 (to be removed in 2.0)
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_Filter_Method: since 1.12 (to be removed in 2.0)
Using an instance of "Twig_Test_Method" for test "of_type" is deprecated since version 1.21. Use \Twig_SimpleTest instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to opcachectl.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
